author: cnbc.com
title: WD-40 posts 2Q profit
text:
SAN DIEGO (AP) _ WD-40 Co. (WDFC) on Thursday reported fiscal second-quarter net income of $14.8 million.
On a per-share basis, the San Diego-based company said it had net income of $1.05.
The maintenance and cleaning product company posted revenue of $101.3 million in the period.
WD-40 expects full-year earnings to be $4.07 to $4.14 per share, with revenue in the range of $407 million to $415 million.
WD-40 shares have climbed 13 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Thursday, shares hit $132.90, a climb of 25 percent in the last 12 months.
